Ako želite koristiti Pocket Code i ostale izvršne datoteke ponuđene od strane Catrobat projekta, morate pristati na naše uvjete korištenja i strogo ih slijediti kada koristite Pocket Code i naše ostale izvršne datoteke. Molimo vas da pogledate link ispod za njihovu preciznu formulaciju. \n
You attempt to use Pocket Code together with Parrot\'s AR.Drone. We strongly remind you to abide to Parrot\'s terms of use for the drone and to Catrobat\'s terms of use for Pocket Code.

Pocket Code je programsko okruženje i interpreter za Android uređaje programskog jezika Catrobat.

 Izvorni kod Pocket Code-a je uglavnom licensiran pod GNU AGPL v3 licensom. Za precizne detalje licence potražite link ispod.
Pocket Code licenca iza izvorni kod

Program sa istim imenom već postoji.\nMolimo da odabereš drugi naziv.

Došlo je do greške prilikom ušitavanja zvuka.
Došlo je do greške. Provjeri vezu sa internetom.
Program nije kompatibilan sa ovom verzijom Pocket Code-a.
The Pocket Code version is outdated. Update now?
Došlo je do greške prilikom kopiranja programa.

You cannot upload this program because it is the same as \'My first program\'. Please modify it, and try again.

Changing the description of an incompatible project is not possible.

Program specific NXT settings are not shown when opening a program.
The mapping of NXT sensors to ports is program specific and can only be configured for opened programs!
The selection of drone configuration properties is program specific and can only be configured within the program.

Do not show this message again.
Do you want to overwrite the Sensor on the chosen port?
Adding UserBrick to UserBrick is not allowed yet!
Caution! Current project and selected project are the same!
Caution! Different resolutions detected. %1$s has resolution %2$dx%3$d and %4$s has resolution %5$dx%6$d. Using resolution of %1$s.
Variable \"%1$s\" is used in both programs. If programs use the same variable name they cannot be merged. Please rename the variable in one of the programs and try again.
List \"%1$s\" is used in both programs. If programs use the same name for their lists they cannot be merged. Please rename the list in one of the programs and try again.
